name: Taking Candy From A Baby
description:
"Like taking candy from a baby"  is a pixel art game about sneaking through tight traps and being swift, in the hopes of getting to the candy at the end.

There are dozens of automated cameras, laser systems, and autonomous robots out to catch you, we'll see if you can prevail.

This game requires a high level of precision and speed to complete.

Level 9 will remain locked until all other levels are completed under the time quota. Thus, speed is key to your success!

Just watch out, it's not as simple as it seems to take candy from this baby...
